snippet: In the first poll to emerge after President Obama announced his support for same-sex marriage, a majority of Americans say it will make no difference to their vote in November.
abstract: In the first poll to emerge after President Obama announced his support for same-sex marriage, a majority of Americans say it will make no difference to their vote in November.

headline.main: Majority Say Obama's Gay Marriage Stance Won't Change Their Vote

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
